amendment.description: Amendment redirects $1 million in funding for Toxic Substances and Environmental Public Health.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect $1 million in funding regarding Toxic Substances and Environmental Public Health.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. LoBiondo.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
